attributes.action: Make HGV salaries a minimum of 38.000/year
attributes.additional_details: To solve the national shortage and also to provide a better living style for the lorry drivers that are so underestimated,  but we and NHS kept the country going through the pandemic. After it...NOBODY CARES AGAIN!
attributes.background:
To resolve the national lorry driver shortage,  HGV salaries a minimum of 38.000/year would bring people back on roads that at the moment do other jobs than lorry driving.
A courier on a van, a taxi driver, they all earn more than a lorry driver.  A lot of jobs are better paid than a lorry driver

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government isn't responsible for setting salaries for private businesses, but you might like to sign this petition calling for a higher minimum hourly wage

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584881
